pullRequest.title: Added JUnit tests for TransportModule part1
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: code-incubus nemanja.milutinovic@endava.com
Added JUnit tests for transport package:

MqttMessageTest.java
MqttPayloadTest.java
MqttTopicTest.java
MqttClientAlreadyConnectedExceptionTest.java
MqttClientCallbackSetExceptionTest.java
MqttClientCleanExceptionTest,java
MqttClientConnectExceptionTest.java
MqttClientDisconnectExceptionTest
MqttClientErrorCodesTest.java
MqttClientConnectionOptionsTest.java

Related Issue
None

nodes.bodyText:
For MqttMessage constructors add additional tests:

alphanumeric characters combined with numbers and whitespaces for requestTopic, responseTopic, Payload and receivedOn paramteres
alphanumeric characters combined with special symbols and whitespaces for requestTopic, responseTopic, Payload and receivedOn paramteres

We need these checks for future, if implementations change, that we get notified by tests.
Also add additional tests just for setters in this case, because for now the setters are only implicitly tested, throught constructors. Again, if implementation changes, we will be "notified" by tests.

nodes.bodyText:
That Exception means that a slf4j-api implementation is missing. So adding commons-logging will fix the issue, but in the "wrong" way in the sense that we use logback as implementation of slf4j .
So this dependency should be changed to logback  with <scope>test</scope>
